turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need an afternoon pick me up. Would you mind running to Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing. What location should I go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think the one at Polaris is closest. And it shouldnt be that crowded this time of day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you know what you want? Would you like your usual again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think today I will try something different for a change

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wow! Being adventurous arent we?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Its a new me. I think I will try one of their cold brew drinks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I like their iced coffee

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will try their iced coffee with milk. 2% milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. Would you like any food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Their danishes and pastries all look good, but I think it is best if i just stick with the coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I will leave now and hopefully there wont be a drive thru-line

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll still be here when you return.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Im back. One iced coffee with 2% milk for you and I decided to get a marshmallow dream bar. Otherwise known to most as a Rice Krispy Treat

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yum, thanks so much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hmm, im not sure how i like this

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have mixed feelings about iced coffee. It depends on my mood

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think next time I will get my usual

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: grand pike place roast with 2 splenda and 2% milk it will be

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know me too well. Thats why i like you
